titleInfo.title: Randy Rich and the Poor Boys (undated)

mods.abstract: Two color window card (red and black on white) announcing Randy Rich and the Poor Boys. Poster is undated and features a metal photoplate of Randy Rich. Poster features a woodcut design used in the 1950s for movie posters.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
recordInfo.recordOrigin: Record has been transformed into MODS v3.5 from a Qualified Dublin Core record by the Digital Library of Tennessee, a service hub of the Digital Public Library of America.
